appId.description: The unique identifier of the application.

archived.description: Indicates if the cohort data is archived or not.

definition.description: The specific definition or criteria for the cohort.

description.description: A brief explanation or summary of the cohort data.

finished.description: Indicates if the cohort data has been finalized.

id.description: The unique identifier for the cohort.

name.description: The name or title of the cohort.

owners.description: The owners or administrators of the cohort.

published.description: Status indicating if the cohort data is published or not.

size.description: Size or scale of the cohort data.

type.description: The type or category of the cohort.

lastMod.description: Timestamp of the last modification made to the cohort.

lastComputed.description: Timestamp of the last computation of cohort data.

hidden.description: Flag to determine if the cohort is hidden from view.

is_predictive.description: Flag to indicate if the cohort is predictive in nature.

is_official_content.description: Indicates if the cohort data is official content.

chart_id.description: The identifier of the chart associated with the cohort.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the cohort was created.

edit_id.description: The ID for editing purposes or version control.

last_viewed.description: Timestamp when the cohort was last viewed.

location_id.description: Identifier of the location associated with the cohort.

metadata.description: Additional information or data related to the cohort.

popularity.description: Popularity rank or score of the cohort.

shortcut_ids.description: Identifiers of any shortcuts associated with the cohort.

view_count.description: The total count of views on the cohort data.

viewers.description: Users or viewers who have access to the cohort data.
